Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
AllergyIntoleranceQuestionnaireQuestionnaire
patientPatient1..1group
patient-namePatient Name0..1string
patient-idPatient ID (SSIN)1..1string
statusAllergyStatus0..1display
clinical-statusClinical Status0..1stringOptions: 3 options
patient-idVerification Status0..1stringOptions: 4 options
allergyintoleranceAllergy or Intolerance?0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
typeType (food, medication, environment, biologic)?0..1choiceOptions: 4 options
codeCode of the allergen or substance?0..1choiceValue Set: https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/ValueSet/be-allergyintolerancecode
recordedRecorded1..1group
recorded-dateDate of Record0..1date
recorderRecorder0..1string
asserterAsserter0..1string
noteNote0..*text
reactionsReaction0..*group
manifestationManifestation0..1choiceValue Set: https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/ValueSet/be-riskmanifestation
exposure-routeExposure Route0..1choiceValue Set: https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/ValueSet/be-exposureroute
noteNote0..1choice

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for clinical-status

  • null#active ("Active")
  • null#inactive ("Inactive")
  • null#resolved ("Resolved")

Answer options for patient-id

  • null#unconfirmed ("Unconfirmed")
  • null#confirmed ("Confirmed")
  • null#refuted ("Refuted")
  • null#entered-in-error ("entered-in-error")

Answer options for allergyintolerance

  • null#allergy ("Allergy")
  • null#intolerance ("Intolerance")

Answer options for type

  • null#food ("Food allergy")
  • null#medication ("Medication allergy or intolerance")
  • null#environment ("Environmental allergy or intolerance")
  • null#biologic ("Biologic allergy or intolerance")

item.text: Code of the allergen or substance?
